summary: This plan outlines the implementation of a comprehensive stakeholder prompt template system that allows stakeholders to prepare detailed project information before the interview phase. This will enhance the quality of project inputs and streamline the discovery process.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content_preview: This plan outlines the implementation of a comprehensive stakeholder prompt template system that allows stakeholders to prepare detailed project infor...

sections.title: Goals
sections.content_preview:
1. **Reduce Interview Time**: Pre-filled answers minimize real-time questioning
2. **Improve Quality**: Stakeholders have time to think and collaborat...

sections.title: 1. Project Vision (Required)
sections.content_preview:
- What are we building? (one sentence)
- Why does this need to exist?
- What problem does it solve?
- What's the vision 3 years from now?

sections.title: 2. Boundaries - What This Is NOT (Critical)
sections.content_preview:
Minimum 5 specific items:
- NOT a...
- Will NOT include...
- NOT for... (user type)
- Will NOT integrate with...
- NOT competing with...

sections.title: 3. Target Users (Required)
sections.content_preview:
- Primary user persona (detailed)
- Secondary users
- User problems/pain points
- Day in the life scenario

sections.title: 4. Success Metrics (Required)
sections.content_preview:
- Launch success criteria
- 6-month goals
- Growth metrics
- Quality metrics

sections.title: 5. Technical Preferences
sections.content_preview:
- Preferred tech stack (if any)
- Must-have integrations
- Performance requirements
- Security requirements
- Scalability needs

sections.title: 6. Business Model
sections.content_preview:
- Revenue model
- Pricing strategy
- Cost considerations
- Market positioning

sections.title: 7. Constraints & Risks
sections.content_preview:
- Timeline constraints
- Budget limitations
- Technical constraints
- Known risks
- Compliance requirements

sections.title: 8. Competition & Differentiation
sections.content_preview:
**Optional Sections by Type**:

**SaaS Module** (`templates/stakeholder-prompts/modules/saas-module.md`):
- Subscription tiers
- Multi-tenancy needs
-...

sections.title: Implementation Timeline
sections.content_preview:
**Week 1**: 
- Create universal template
- Design optional modules
- Build example prompts

**Week 2**:
- Implement validator
- Update Project Analyze...

sections.title: Success Criteria
sections.content_preview:
1. **Adoption**: 50%+ of new projects use prompt templates
2. **Time Savings**: 40% reduction in interview time
3. **Quality**: Average prompt score >...

sections.title: Risk Mitigation
sections.content_preview:
1. **Over-complexity**: Keep template simple and guided
2. **Adoption resistance**: Show clear time/quality benefits
3. **Technical barriers**: Suppor...

sections.title: Future Enhancements
sections.content_preview:
1. **AI-Assisted Filling**: Help complete sections based on partial input
2. **Industry Templates**: Specialized templates by industry
3. **Collaborat...

sections.content_preview:

Phase 3: Workflow Integration.content_preview:

- NOT THIS list → Project Truth constraints

Phase 4: Supporting Tools.content_preview:
Support for:
- Google Docs exported markdown
- Existing PRDs (with mapping)
- Notion exports
- Other common formats

Phase 5: Documentation & Training.content_preview:
Update agents to understand:
- Prompt file structure
- How to reference prompt content
- Integration with their workflows
- Quality indicators

Phase 6: Testing & Refinement.content_preview:
- Time saved in interviews
- Prompt quality scores
- Project success correlation
- User satisfaction
- Template evolution rate
